text.headline: 18: Additional New 9 Holes
text.text:
Lakewood Golf Resort is a public 9 hole golf course located in Sylvan Lake in the province of Alberta, Canada. The facility has a practice range and practice short game area with putting greens. An additional 9 holes is being grassed and growing in currently. Announced opening is in spring 2024.

The resort is located in Alberta's Lake Country at the Sylvan Lake junction of Highway 11A and Highway 20.
